question: Is this actually private?
answer: Yes. Everything runs on your computer. Voice recordings stored locally. AI model runs locally. Nothing sent to any server. Run with internet disabled - works perfectly. (Optional cloud models coming, but default is always local-first)

question: Does it work offline?
answer: Yes. After one-time AI model download (2-10 GB), everything runs on your computer. Laptop in airplane mode? Still works perfectly.

question: How fast is it?
answer: Depends on computer, model choice, and speech length. Decent laptop with small model: 1-3 seconds for few sentences. With GPU acceleration: near-instant. Larger models take few seconds longer but more accurate.

question: How accurate is it?
answer: Very. Whisper and Parakeet are among best free speech recognition models available. Accuracy depends on audio quality, background noise, and model. Larger models more accurate but slower. In practice: accurate enough for daily use without constant corrections.

question: What languages are supported?
answer: All major languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and more. Select language in settings. Different models support different languages. Some have specific language variants.

question: Will this work on my computer?
answer: Windows 10/11: yes. macOS and Linux: coming soon. Don't need powerful computer, but GPU acceleration helps (NVIDIA CUDA). Works fine on CPU-only, just bit slower.

question: What microphone do I need?
answer: Whatever you already have. Built-in laptop mics work. USB mics work. Headset mics work. Better microphones = better results, but don't need anything special.

question: Can I customize the keyboard shortcut?
answer: Yes. Default is Ctrl+Space, change to whatever you want in settings.

question: What about my clipboard?
answer: App saves clipboard before pasting, restores after. Your copied content isn't lost.

question: Can I use this at work?
answer: Yes. Commercial license included. Use for personal projects, professional work, client communications, whatever you need.

question: What if I have problems?
answer: Email creator directly. Personal help. If broken, will fix. If confusing, will explain. You're not alone.

question: What's the catch with Early Access?
answer: No catch. Product works now. Called Early Access because actively building new features based on user feedback. You help shape what gets built next, and get lowest price ever.

question: Will the price increase?
answer: Yes. This is Early Access pricing. When product leaves beta, price goes up. Buy now to lock in lifetime access at this price. No future charges, ever.

question: What's your refund policy?
answer: 30-day money-back guarantee. Don't like it? Email for refund. No argument, no hassle.

question: How does this relate to your other products?
answer: Part of growing Knowii ecosystem. Voice AI helps capture thoughts faster. Knowii Community helps organize/leverage that knowledge. Knowledge Worker Kit gives frameworks to use it all effectively. Interconnected systems that amplify how you think and work.
